- [ ] `docs/` — Documentation only
- [ ] `chore/` — Tooling, config, or maintenance (no app code change)

## Code review checklist (for reviewers)
Before approving, confirm:

- [ ] **Code runs** — Changes build and run without errors (`npm run build` / `npm run dev`)
- [ ] **No unintended edits** — Only files related to this change are modified
- [ ] **Readable** — Code is clear and follows existing project style
- [ ] **No secrets** — No API keys, passwords, or `.env` values in the code
- [ ] **Description matches** — PR description accurately describes what the code does
- [ ] **Branch name** — Branch follows convention: `feature/`, `fix/`, `docs/`, or `chore/` + short name
